item.title: Utilities
item.description: Overview Convert Image to Base64 RSA Encryption Convert Image to Base64 https://codebeautify.org/image-to-base64-converter RSA Encryption RSA(Rivest-Shamir-Adleman) is an Asymmetric encryption technique that uses two different keys as public and private keys to perform the encryption and decryption. With RSA, you can encrypt sensitive information with a public key and a matching private key is used to decrypt the encrypted message. API to generate public key RSA Encryption via online API to retrieve the public key url: https://healthidsbx.
